title: Front-end Development for the Electronic Data Capture (EDC) System Panel
description: Designed and developed the front-end interface of the EDC system panel using React and Material-UI, ensuring a responsive and intuitive user experience. Implemented Redux for efficient state management and integrated MUI Kit for a modern, consistent UI design. Supported English and Farsi language options to enhance accessibility and usability. The EDC system was developed to facilitate data collection for medical trials related to dialysis. It provided users with the ability to design custom forms, define study-specific steps, and manage structured participant data. Users could create input fields, customize field types, and apply validation rules for structured data entry. The system also supported conditional questions to guide participants through personalized data collection flows. Workflow and process management functionalities allowed users to define and track data collection steps efficiently. Additionally, administrative tools enabled role management with permissions settings, and participant management allowed users to add and organize individuals within the system. Advanced reporting features provided structured analytics with customizable filters, ensuring comprehensive insights into collected data.
